00028 /* Peripheral group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00033 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00034 #include "lpc17xx_nvic.h"

00037 /* Private Macros ------------------------------------------------------------- */
00042 /* Vector table offset bit mask */
00043 #define NVIC_VTOR_MASK              0x3FFFFF80
00044 
00050 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00056 /*****************************************************************************/
00067 void NVIC_DeInit(void)
00068 {
00069         uint8_t tmp;
00070 
00071         /* Disable all interrupts */
00072         NVIC->ICER[0] = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00073         NVIC->ICER[1] = 0x00000001;
00074         /* Clear all pending interrupts */
00075         NVIC->ICPR[0] = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00076         NVIC->ICPR[1] = 0x00000001;
00077 
00078         /* Clear all interrupt priority */
00079         for (tmp = 0; tmp < 32; tmp++) {
00080                 NVIC->IP[tmp] = 0x00;
00081         }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*****************************************************************************/
00102 void NVIC_SCBDeInit(void)
00103 {
00104         uint8_t tmp;
00105 
00106         SCB->ICSR = 0x0A000000;
00107         SCB->VTOR = 0x00000000;
00108         SCB->AIRCR = 0x05FA0000;
00109         SCB->SCR = 0x00000000;
00110         SCB->CCR = 0x00000000;
00111 
00112         for (tmp = 0; tmp < 32; tmp++) {
00113                 SCB->SHP[tmp] = 0x00;
00114         }
00115 
00116         SCB->SHCSR = 0x00000000;
00117         SCB->CFSR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00118         SCB->HFSR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00119         SCB->DFSR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 /*****************************************************************************/
00128 void NVIC_SetVTOR(uint32_t offset)
00129 {
00130 //      SCB->VTOR  = (offset & NVIC_VTOR_MASK);
00131         SCB->VTOR  = offset;
00132 }
